[TITLE]

[URL]

[COMMENTS]

DustDroid 300 HEPA Vacuum

http://www.dustlessdepot.com/DustDroid_300_HEPA_Vacuum_p/h0030.htm

If you’re looking for the next level of dust containment without going overboard on budget look no further than the DustDroid 300 HEPA Vacuum. Producing 300 CFM with a 20 gallon canister, the DustDroid 300 captures even the finest dust from construction materials such as concrete, masonry, stone, and fiberglass. Empowered with the AirBlast filter cleaning system along with AirBender technology enables contractors to work up to 10 times longer between filter cleanings. This revolutionary system captures the dust before it gets to the HEPA filter, extending the life of the expensive filter and the overall performance of the vacuum. It’s the 21st century, so put technology on your side and add convenience to your once-dusty work environment with the DustDroid 300.

The WunderBag Micro Pre-Filter for Dustless Wet/Dry Vacuums

http://www.dustlessdepot.com/Wunderbag_Micro_Pre_filter_for_Dustless_DustVac_p/13141.htm

The Wunderbag Micro Pre-filter is the revolutionary filtration system that gives Dustless Vacuums a serious advantage over other vacuums. It’s not just another vacuum bag filter; it can actually captures particles down to .5 microns leaving only the .3 micron particles for the HEPA filter. This greatly improves vacuum performance and extends the life of the expensive HEPA filter. The Wunderbag is designed to hold up to 80 pounds of dust while the vacuum is made to be emptied at 40 pounds. This gives the filter 50% more surface area to ensure that there is always room to support proper airflow, which is crucial in dust control applications. Economically priced, the Wunderbag is simple to install and retains its strength even when wet. There really is no other vacuum filter bag like it!

DustPro 600 Industrial HEPA Vacuum for Wood Floors

http://www.dustlessdepot.com/DustPro_600_HEPA_Vacuum_p/h0062.htm

The DustPro 600 HEPA Vacuum is the ultimate form of dust control when handling wood flooring applications. Producing 600 CFM with a 50 gallon canister allows large jobs to be tackled with ease. Contractors like how the unit is priced considerably lower than other HEPA vacuums. The AirBender technology allows them to work 10 times longer between filter cleanings by capturing 98% of dust before it reaches the HEPA filter. This design allows the DustPro 600 to sand up to 1,200 square feet before removing the plastic collection bag. It is engineered for one belt machine and two edgers, but can also be used with a gym floor rider, collecting dust from two 12” drum machines ran at full speed. There are also no moving parts or solenoids requiring less maintenance and greater reliability. Don’t settle for less; get the right tool for the job with the DustPro 600.

DustDroid 600 HEPA Vacuum

http://www.dustlessdepot.com/product_p/h0060.htm

Capture extra fine dust from cutting, drilling, grinding, and sanding materials with ease using the DustDroid 600. Whether you’re working with concrete, masonry, stone, fiberglass, or other construction materials the DustDroid 600 can handle it. The Air-Bender technology allows higher productivity by extending cleaning intervals ten times longer than other comparable vacuums. It comes fully loaded with two motors, two HEPA filters, two AirBlast handles, and two mini-helic gauges to tell you when each filter needs cleaned. Because there are no solenoids, the DustDroid 600 requires less maintenance than pulse-cleaning systems while extending the life of the expensive HEPA filter. Economically priced, the DustDroid 600 is the clear choice for any professional contractor who wants the best in dust control.

Love-Less Cheetah II AshVac

http://www.dustlessdepot.com/Cheetah_II_from_Loveless_Ash_Vacuums_p/mu305.htm

For more than 20 years the Love-Less AshVac has been the best selling ash vacuum. The Cheetah II AshVac is designed for safe, clean, and convenient cleaning of ash out of fireplaces, wood stoves, pellet stoves, and bio fuel stoves. NEVER use a household or shop vacuum for cleaning your fireplace. Embers can stay alive for days, which can ignite inside the paper filter bag and feed off household debris. Every component of the Love-Less Cheetah II AshVac is designed for safety using metal components, a fire-proof canister, and a filter that’s fire resistant up to 1,000 degrees Fahrenheit. The patented filtration system is designed for the cleanest possible removal of ash. Don’t take the risk when handling ash, be safe and have peace-of-mind with the Love-Less AshVac.

Dustless DustBot 300 HEPA Vacuum

http://www.dustlesstechnologies.com/dustbot300vacuum.htm

Save time and money on cleanup while meeting EPA RPP guidelines with the DustBot 300. Contractors like how it can be powered by an onboard 3000 watt generator or a standard 120 volt current. The DustBot 300 is designed with the operator in mind, offering a convenient method of capturing extra fine dust while cutting, drilling, grinding, and sanding for a wide range of construction materials. The AirBender technology enables contractors to work 10 times longer by capturing 98% of the dust before it gets to the HEPA filter. This leaves only the finest dust for the expensive HEPA filter, greatly extending its life. A console gauge tells you when airflow is dropping to active the AirBlast system, which allows the contractor to clean the HEPA filter while the vacuum is running. Put superior technology on your side with the DustBot 300.

ToolSync Wireless Tool Start System

http://www.dustlessdepot.com/product_p/d5254.htm

Wirelessly integrate the on/off functions of power hand tools with a Dustless vacuum with ToolSync from Dustless Technologies. As soon as you start the tool, the vacuum turns on simultaneously whether it’s across the room, around the corner, or on a different floor. This system allows several functional options including one power tool operated by several vacuums or one vacuum can be activated by several tools. You also don’t have to worry about throwing breaker switches either with ToolSync. It enables you to operate higher amp tools by plugging the power tool and vacuum into separate circuits. The wireless communication lets both tools operate simultaneously without an extra cord. ToolSync offers options for electric and pneumatic tools. Fewer tangles, less hassle, and the elimination of trip hazards with ToolSync.

HEPA Pack Backpack Vacuum by Dustless Technologies

http://www.dustlessdepot.com/HEPA_Pack_Vacuum_p/15505.htm

Vacuums can be clunky and limit mobility. That’s not the case with the light and easy to carry HEPA Pack. This highly portable vacuum provides the innovation of Dustless Technologies on a smaller and lighter scale. The two HEPA bags allow it to meet EPA RRP guidelines for renovation projects that might produce hazardous dust or debris. With belt-mounted controls and a back-friendly hardness, the HEPA Pack is designed for convenience with the operator in mind.

Dustie Dust Shroud for Hand Grinders

http://www.dustlessdepot.com/5_Dustie_Dust_Collection_Shroud_p/d1836.htm

The Dustie dust shroud is an economic choice for dust-free concrete grinding. The adjustable design allows it to fit most 5” and 7” hand grinders with ease while capturing 99% of dust at the point of origin. This is important for contractors who need to meet EPA RRP guidelines and for those who want to save time and money on costly cleanup. The molded cut lines enable you to customize your Dustie for two different operation angles. Get rid of the mess and work more efficiently with the Dustie dust shroud.

DiscBuddie Dust Shroud for Sanders and Polishers

http://www.dustlessdepot.com/product_p/d1000.htm

Capture 99% of the dust when using a disc sander or polisher with the DiscBuddie dust shroud. It is designed to meet EPA RRP requirements only if used with a certified HEPA vacuum, such as the Dustless Technologies Wet Dry Vacuum. The easy-to-install DiscBuddie captures hazardous materials at the point of origin while being adjustable for operator convenience. It’s great for sanding lap siding, lead, asbestos, and various marine industry applications. The DiscBuddie is engineered with you in mind to make the job cleaner and more efficient.

Dustless Technologies HEPA Wet Dry Vacuum

http://www.dustlessdepot.com/Dustless_Full_Unit_Certified_HEPA_Vacuum_p/16006.htm

The Dustless Technologies HEPA Wet Dry Vacuum is the ultimate form of dust control. Priced competitively, this vacuum is full-unit HEPA certified and loaded with features that add convenience to day-to-day operations involving dust control. The airtight design won’t cough out dust when powering up while the Wunderbag captures the majority of the dust. This greatly extends the life of the expensive HEPA filter while improving airflow and vacuum performance. The Wet Dry HEPA Vacuum can go from dry to wet operation without stopping and is engineered to fit a vast array of Dustless Technologies accessories for a wide variety of dust control applications. Save precious time and money on cleanup and improve your performance with the Dustless Technologies HEPA Wet Dry Vacuum.

Dustless Technologies HEPA Wet Dry Vacuum

http://www.dustlessdepot.com/Dustless_Full_Unit_Certified_HEPA_Vacuum_p/16006.htm

The Dustless Technologies HEPA Wet Dry Vacuum is the ultimate form of dust control. Priced competitively, this vacuum is full-unit HEPA certified and loaded with features that add convenience to day-to-day operations involving dust control. The airtight design won’t cough out dust when powering up while the Wunderbag captures the majority of the dust. This greatly extends the life of the expensive HEPA filter while improving airflow and vacuum performance. The Wet Dry HEPA Vacuum can go from dry to wet operation without stopping and is engineered to fit a vast array of Dustless Technologies accessories for a wide variety of dust control applications. Save precious time and money on cleanup and improve your performance with the Dustless Technologies HEPA Wet Dry Vacuum.

Turbo Drywall Sander

http://www.dustlessdepot.com/Dustless_Turbo_Drywall_Sander_Dust_Control_System_p/50001.htm

High walls and tight corners will no longer escape your sanding efforts with the Turbo Drywall Sander. Whether you’re a contractor, do-it-yourselfer, or homeowner the light-weight design and 6 foot extension pole is great for tricky kitchens, bathrooms, or touch up work. What makes the Turbo Drywall Sander great is its ability to capture the dust as it’s created. The secret is the air turbine in the orbital head delivering an astonishing 10,000 RPM when combined with the Dustless Wet Dry Vacuum. With grits ranging from 80 to 200, this is a versatile tool is engineered to tackle your light-duty sanding needs with the greatest convenience and the least cleanup possible.

CutBuddie Dust Shroud for Hand Grinders

http://www.dustlessdepot.com/7_CutBuddie_0153_p/d1856.htm

You’ll see professional contractors all across the country using the CutBuddie Dust Shroud for hand grinders on their commercial and high-end residential construction projects because it is like no other dust shroud available. Easily installed on most 4” to 5” or 6” to 9” hand grinders, the CutBuddie captures 99% of dust at the point of origin to comply with EPA RRP guidelines and saving you time and money on cleanup. This dust shroud is made of a clear polycarbonate allowing greater visibility which is important in making intricate cuts, tuck pointing, or crack chasing. Lay your old work methods to rest and put technology on your side with the CutBuddie from Dustless Technologies.

DustBuddie dust shroud by Dustless Technologies

http://www.dustlessdepot.com/5_DustBuddie_0153_Dust_Control_Shroud_p/d1835.htm

The DustBuddie dust shroud by Dustless Technologies captures 99% of all airborne dust created by a hand grinder. The adjustable collar allows it to fit most hand grinders while accommodating different grinding wheels and disks. The DustBuddie rides on a spring cushion, keeping the dust shroud flat so the dust won't escape when grinding on textured or uneven surfaces. The clear polycarbonate material enables greater visibility while the brush skirt improves lateral motion allowing the DustBuddie dust shroud to perform smoothly and precisely.

The DustHoodie Dust Shroud for Hand Grinders

http://www.dustlessdepot.com/8_Flexible_DustHoodie_p/d1860.htm

The DustHoodie dust shroud gives you another way to capture dust on the job site. Designed to fit most 7" to 9" hand grinders, it's excellent for floor prep applications. The durable synthetic material, anchored with a metal brim, enables you to get right up against a wall or around tricky obstacles. There's also no need to adjust the height because of the flexibility of the synthetic fabric. The DustHoodie is a great choice for those looking to save time and money on cleanup.

Dustless Technologies Wet Dry Vacuum

http://www.dustlessdepot.com/Dustless_Wet_Dry_Vacuum_from_Dustless_Depot_p/16003.htm

Save time and money while increasing productivity with the Dustless Technologies Wet Dry Vacuum. Imagine a world where dust no longer plagues your job site; a world of quick cleanup, less hassle, and a healthier environment for all. The Dustless Technologies Wet Dry Vacuum makes this a reality without sucking your wallet dry. The two layers of filtration paired with optional dust collection accessories enable the vacuum to collect extremely fine dust created from a wide variety of renovation duties such as cutting, sanding, crack chasing, and tuck pointing. The Dustless Technologies Wet Dry Vacuum maintains optimal performance enabling sufficient airflow, while the operator can go from dry to wet vacuuming without having to change filters. Receiving a 100% from the Handyman's Club of America, this vacuum is an economical choice for contractors and do-it-yourselfers.

The FlatBoy Sanding Disk Holder

http://www.dustlessdepot.com/FlatBoy_Sanding_Disc_Holder_For_Flat_Floor_Sanding_p/d4670.htm

The FlatBoy is a revolutionary sanding disk holder that enables the operator to sand completely flat so the entire surface area of the sanding disk is utilized. This also enables the user to rest more weight on the grinder itself reducing operator fatigue. The FlatBoy is quick and easy to install also allowing you to change sand paper in a snap. Unlike similar products, the hub mounts below flush, so it doesn't interfere with the sanded surface or damage the hub itself. Paired with a Dustless Technologies DustHoodie, the FlatBoy offers the best solution in dust control for right angle grinders.

DustBubble Debuts at NAHB IBS Show

http://www.dustlesstechnologies.com/blog/?p=192

The DustBubble, by Dustless Technologies, was introduced at the NAHB IBS show. Contractors liked how DustBubbles can be used for capturing dust when drilling with a hand drill.

DustBubble Video Shows DustBubbles in Action

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=boCAULMcyVw&feature=youtu.be

DustBubbles are used to capture dust when drilling with a hand drill. DustBubbles are from Dustless Technologies.

DustBubble Captures Dust When Drilling

http://bubbastools.com/?p=212

The DustBubble is a handy way to capture dust when using a hand drill. DustBubbles are small plastic pouches with adhesive, so they stick to the surface being drilled. Stick it. Drill it. Toss it.

DustBubble by Dustless Technologies

http://www.dustlesstools.com/dustbubble.htm

Buy DustBubbles from Dustless Technologies. DustBubbles are a revolutionary new way to capture dust when drilling with a hand drill. The DustBubble is a small plastic pouch with temporary adhesive. Simply stick the DustBubble to the wall, drill through it, peel it off and throw it away.

DustBubble Video Shows How DustBubbles Capture Dust

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i-SOtIzMYVA&feature=youtu.be

Dustbubbles capture dust when drilling with a hand drill. This video shows how DustBubbles work. Simply to use. Stick it. Drill it. Toss it.
